body_html:
The error message is as following. The problematic IndexedSlices comes from "gradients = tf.gradients(losses[b], params)".

The calculated tf.gradients returns:
[Tensor, IndexedSlices, IndexedSlices, Tensor, Tensor, Tensor, IndexedSlices, Tensor, Tensor]

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "train.py", line 277, in
tf.app.run()
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
File "train.py", line 274, in main
train()
File "train.py", line 168, in train
model = create_model(sess, False)
File "train.py", line 142, in create_model
forward_only=forward_only, gpus=FLAGS.gpus)
File "/root/dialog_sms/seq2seq_model.py", line 200, in init
gradients = self.average_gradients(tower_clipped_grads)
File "/root/dialog_sms/seq2seq_model.py", line 213, in average_gradients
grad = tf.reduce_mean(tower_grad, 1)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py", line 1089, in reduce_mean
keep_dims, name=name)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py", line 1345, in _mean
keep_dims=keep_dims, name=name)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 454, in apply_op
as_ref=input_arg.is_ref)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 621, in convert_to_tensor
ret = conversion_func(value, dtype=dtype, name=name, as_ref=as_ref)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py", line 630, in _autopacking_conversion_function
return _autopacking_helper(v, inferred_dtype, name or "packed")
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py", line 576, in _autopacking_helper
converted_elem = _autopacking_helper(elem, dtype, str(i))
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py", line 592, in _autopacking_helper
constant_op.constant(elem, dtype=dtype, name=str(i)))
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/constant_op.py", line 163, in constant
tensor_util.make_tensor_proto(value, dtype=dtype, shape=shape))
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/tensor_util.py", line 353, in make_tensor_proto
_AssertCompatible(values, dtype)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/tensor_util.py", line 290, in _AssertCompatible
(dtype.name, repr(mismatch), type(mismatch).name))
TypeError: Expected float32, got <tensorflow.python.framework.ops.IndexedSlices object at 0x7f2ab403bfd0> of type 'IndexedSlices' instead.

body:
The error message is as following. The problematic IndexedSlices comes from "gradients = tf.gradients(losses[b], params)". 

The calculated tf.gradients returns:
[Tensor, IndexedSlices, IndexedSlices, Tensor, Tensor, Tensor, IndexedSlices, Tensor, Tensor]
